All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Asiakas
The `Asiakas` class models a customer in a simulation.
IKontrolleriForM
The IKontrolleriForM interface defines the methods that a controller for the simulator should implement.
IKontrolleriForV
The IKontrolleriForV interface defines the methods that a controller for the simulator should implement for the view.
ISimulaattorinUI
The ISimulaattorinUI interface defines the methods that a user interface for the simulator should implement.
IVisualisointi
The IVisualisointi interface defines the methods that a visualization for the simulator should implement.
Kontrolleri
The Kontrolleri class in JavaFX manages the simulation's operations and UI interactions, handles user inputs, adjusts simulation speed, and displays results and errors.
KontrolleriData
This class is responsible for controlling the data in the simulation.
Main
Starts software
MariadbConnection
This class is responsible for managing the connection to the MariaDB database.
OmaMoottori
The `OmaMoottori` class extends `Moottori` to implement a specific simulation engine, managing customer arrivals and service processes across different service points.
Palvelupiste
The `Palvelupiste` class represents a service point in a simulation.
Simu
The Simu class represents a simulation in the system.
SimuDao
This class is responsible for performing database operations related to the Simu entity.
TapahtumanTyyppi
Enum representing the types of events in the simulation model.
UusiGui
 
UusiGuiKontolleri
This class is responsible for controlling the GUI of the application.
Visualisointi
This class is responsible for visualizing the simulation data.
Visualisointi2
This class is responsible for visualizing the simulation data in a different style.
VisualisointiNaytto1
This class is responsible for visualizing the simulation data in a specific style.
